description: Framework for governing and managing multiple service providers in a multi-vendor environment

overview.purpose: Enable effective integration and management of services delivered by multiple suppliers
key_benefits: Reduced risk and complexity in multi-vendor environments
Better value delivery through optimized partnerships

governance_model.description: Framework for decision-making and accountability across all service providers

key_elements.responsibility: Strategic oversight and major decision making

operating_model.description: How services are delivered and coordinated in practice

service_towers.typical_providers: Service management specialists, ITSM tooling vendors

integration_mechanisms.description: Methods for ensuring seamless service delivery across providers

mechanisms.description: Coordinated execution of services across multiple providers
mechanisms.implementation: Automated workflows, process integration, shared tooling

mechanisms.description: Consistent data sharing and configuration management
mechanisms.implementation: Shared CMDBs, standardized APIs, data governance
Integrated dashboards, KPI aggregation, SLA management

mechanisms.description: Coordinated approach to managing risks and issues
mechanisms.implementation: Shared risk registers, escalation procedures, root cause analysis

key_activities: Develop service catalog and integration requirements
success_criteria: Defined operating model with clear accountabilities

key_activities: Train teams and establish ways of working
Pilot SIAM processes with selected services
success_criteria: Completed transition plan with clear timelines
Trained teams ready for SIAM operations
All services operating under SIAM model

key_activities: Regular review and optimization of partnerships
Evolution of governance and operating models

common_challenges.mitigation: Start simple, evolve gradually, ensure clear decision rights
Standardize interfaces, invest in automation, prioritize high-impact integrations
Establish common ways of working, regular relationship management, shared goals
Define clear SLAs, implement end-to-end monitoring, regular performance reviews
Clear communication, training programs, demonstrate quick wins

regulatory_considerations: GDPR compliance for data sharing between providers
cultural_factors: Strong focus on transparency and accountability
